Title: Study Comrade Mai Xiande's unyielding proletarian spirit
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Mai Xiande (1945) worked as an electrical engineer on a Navy corvette. In 1965, during a skirmish with Taiwanese warships, he was seriously wounded but stayed on his post to ensure that the ship continued to function. He survived the ordeal, but the brain damage he suffered would mark him for the rest of his life.The characters in the right hand corner read "Dare to engage in revolution, dare to struggle, do not fear to wage war, do not fear to become a martyr".
